uiConfig.studyEndMsg: **Thank you for participating. You may click this link and return to Prolific**: [https://app.prolific.com/submissions/complete?cc=CVRK3FRJ](https://app.prolific.com/submissions/complete?cc=CVRK3FRJ)

VO-image1.instruction: Please answer the following question about the chart:

response.prompt: What are your insights and take-aways from this plot for this data?

VO-image2.instruction: Please answer the following question about the plot:

response.prompt: How confident are you in your answers?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all confident, 5 = Very confident

response.prompt: How well did you understand the information presented?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all understood, 5 = Completely understood

response.prompt: How effective was the plot at conveying information?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all effective, 5 = Extremely effective

TO-text1.instruction: Please answer the following question about the text:

response.prompt: What are your insights and take-aways from the description of this data?

TO-text2.instruction: Please answer the following question about the text:

response.prompt: How confident are you in your answers?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all confident, 5 = Very confident

response.prompt: How well did you understand the information presented?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all understood, 5 = Completely understood

response.prompt: How effective was the description of the data at conveying information?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all effective, 5 = Extremely effective

TandV1.instruction: Please answer the following question about the content:

response.prompt: What are your insights and take-aways from the plot and the description for this data?

TandV2.instruction: Please answer the following questions about the content:

response.prompt: How confident are you in your answers?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all confident, 5 = Very confident

response.prompt: How well did you understand the information presented?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all understood, 5 = Completely understood

response.prompt: How effective was the content at conveying information?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all effective, 5 = Extremely effective

response.prompt: Please enter your Prolific ID
Do you consent to the study and wish to continue?
What is the largest set?
What is the largest intersection?
response.secondaryText: Select all Sets in the Intersection

response.prompt: How many sets make up the largest intersection?

options.label: It is only of a single set
options.value: It is only of a single set

options.label: It is the intersection of 2-3 sets
options.value: It is the intersection of 2-3 sets

options.label: It is the intersection of many sets
options.value: It is the intersection of many sets

options.label: It is the empty intersection (no sets)
options.value: It is the empty intersection (no sets)

correctAnswer.answer: It is the empty intersection (no sets)

response.prompt: Which presentation modality did you find most effective?
Which condition did you find the least effective?
If you were to receive information in the future, which format would you prefer?
Did you find UpSet plots easy to read?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Very difficult, 5 = Very easy

response.prompt: Did you find the text descriptions easy to read?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Very difficult, 5 = Very easy

response.prompt: Did you find the text description too short or too long?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Much too short, 5 = Much too long

response.prompt: Please comment on the text descriptions. Did you miss anything in the text description? If yes, do you have suggestions for what should be included?
How experienced are you with Data Visualization?
response.secondaryText: 1 = Not at all experienced, 5 = Very experienced

response.prompt: Do you have any other comments?
